translations.translation: Has the story reached you of the legions
Has the story of the hordes
Has the story of the armies reached you,
Have you not heard about the stories of the armies
Did the story of the armies reach you?
Has the story reached you of the hosts.
Has not there come to you the story of the hosts,
Hast thou received the story of the hosts,
Hath there come unto thee the story of the hosts
Have you not heard the story of the hosts
Hath there come Unto thee the story of the hosts-
Did you receive the story of the hosts
Has the story reached thee, of the forces-
Has the story reached you of the hosts,
Has it come to you the story of the hosts
Has there come to you the story of the legions?
Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -
[85:17] Have you, O Muhammad (s), received the story of the hosts,
(Hath there come unto thee) Muhammad-He asked His Prophet about this because He did not inform him about it before and then He did-(the story of the hosts

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثمَّ أشار سبحانه إلى تسلية حبيبه صلى الله عليه وسلم، وحثه على الصبر بأذيات قومه وتكذيبهم إياه مكابرةً فقال: { هَلُ أَتَاكَ } أي: قد أتاك ووصل إليك، وثبت ذلك عندك يا أكمل الرسل بالتواتر { حَدِيثُ ٱلْجُنُودِ } [البروج: 17] أي: أخبار الأمم السالفة، وقصة تكذيبهم للرسل والكتب، وانتامنا عنهم بعدما بلغ أذيات الرسل غايتها
